column3: News;Kandal: Police reports say a Chinese man who died in his room at 8:10 am on January 27
column7: Kandal Province.------Forensic police officials said that the victim
column9: a 31-year-old Chinese man worked at an online casino at Crown Resort
column12: eight friends who were staying together in the same room had got up and tried to wake the victim to go to work. When it was realized he was dead
column13: they reported to the police for review.------The cause of death was not immediately clear. ------http://cambodiapolice.com/policekh/146139
